nodes.text: The Pommrio family was a Chiss family belonging to the Chiss Ascendancy's Great Families. It possessed a small fleet. The Pommrio family was allied with the Ruling Plikh family.

The Pommrio family was one of three Great Families involved in Haplif of the Agbui and Jixtus's conspiracy to draw the Chiss Ascendancy into civil war. The other two families were the Erighal family, allied with the Ruling Dasklo family; and the Xodlak family, allied with the Ruling Irizi family.
